alert.note: Alert for Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pendleton (Northeast Oregon and Southeast Washington)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued January 09 at 3:38AM PST until January 09 at 4:00PM PST by NWS Pendleton
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM PST THIS AFTERNOON ALONG THE BASE OF THE OREGON BLUE MOUNTAINS... * WHAT...Southeast winds 35 to 45 mph with gusts up to 65 mph expected along the base of the Blue Mountains. * WHERE...Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon. * WHEN...Until 4 PM PST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Strongest winds are expected along the base and slopes of the Blue Mountains. Routes affected include Interstate 84 east of Pendleton, Highway 11, and Highway 395 south of Pendleton.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Foothills of the Northern Blue Mountains of Oregon
